title: it doesn't let me get into e game
body: I have an issu, and it's when the game is loadng it appears an unspecified error, when im trying to launch the game, and I don't know what to do, I already uninstall and reinstall it like 3 times

replies.body:
If you are consistently getting an unspecified error message when you start the patcher, this is usually a type of connection issue.  Essentially your computer is trying to maintain a connection with our Patcher Servers, but something is blocking it from doing so.  In order to resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  

Let me know if you still have the same issue!
